     3  import (
     4  	"context"
     5  	"errors"
     6  	"net/url"
     7  	"strings"
     8  	"time"
     9  
    10  	"cosmossdk.io/math"
    11  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/pkg/utils"
    12  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/types"
    13  	gnfdSdkTypes "github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield/sdk/types"
    14  	spTypes "github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield/x/sp/types"
    15  	sdk "github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/types"
    16  	"github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/x/authz"
    17  	govTypes "github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/x/gov/types"
    18  )

    20  type SP interface {
    21  	// ListStorageProviders return the storage provider info on chain
    22  	// isInService indicates if only display the sp with STATUS_IN_SERVICE status
    23  	ListStorageProviders(ctx context.Context, isInService bool) ([]spTypes.StorageProvider, error)
    24  	// GetStorageProviderInfo return the sp info with the sp chain address
    25  	GetStorageProviderInfo(ctx context.Context, SPAddr sdk.AccAddress) (*spTypes.StorageProvider, error)
    26  	// GetStoragePrice returns the storage price for a particular storage provider, including update time, read price, store price and .etc.
    27  	GetStoragePrice(ctx context.Context, SPAddr string) (*spTypes.SpStoragePrice, error)
    28  	// GetSecondarySpStorePrice returns the secondary storage price, including update time and store price
    29  	GetSecondarySpStorePrice(ctx context.Context) (*spTypes.SecondarySpStorePrice, error)
    30  	// GrantDepositForStorageProvider submit a grant transaction to allow gov module account to deduct the specified number of tokens
    31  	GrantDepositForStorageProvider(ctx context.Context, spAddr string, depositAmount math.Int, opts types.GrantDepositForStorageProviderOptions) (string, error)
    32  	// CreateStorageProvider submits a proposal to create a storage provider to the greenfield blockchain, and it returns a proposal ID
    33  	CreateStorageProvider(ctx context.Context, fundingAddr, sealAddr, approvalAddr, gcAddr string, endpoint string, depositAmount math.Int, description spTypes.Description, opts types.CreateStorageProviderOptions) (uint64, string, error)
    34  	// UpdateSpStoragePrice updates the read price, storage price and free read quota for a particular storage provider
    35  	UpdateSpStoragePrice(ctx context.Context, spAddr string, readPrice, storePrice sdk.Dec, freeReadQuota uint64, TxOption gnfdSdkTypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    36  }
    37  
    38  func (c *client) GetStoragePrice(ctx context.Context, spAddr string) (*spTypes.SpStoragePrice, error) {
    39  	spAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(spAddr)
    40  	if err != nil {
    41  		return nil, err
    42  	}
    43  	resp, err := c.chainClient.QueryGetSpStoragePriceByTime(ctx, &spTypes.QueryGetSpStoragePriceByTimeRequest{
    44  		SpAddr:    spAcc.String(),
    45  		Timestamp: 0,
    46  	})
    47  	if err != nil {
    48  		return nil, err
    49  	}
    50  	return &resp.SpStoragePrice, nil
    51  }
    52  
    53  func (c *client) GetSecondarySpStorePrice(ctx context.Context) (*spTypes.SecondarySpStorePrice, error) {
    54  	resp, err := c.chainClient.QueryGetSecondarySpStorePriceByTime(ctx, &spTypes.QueryGetSecondarySpStorePriceByTimeRequest{
    55  		Timestamp: 0,
    56  	})
    57  	if err != nil {
    58  		return nil, err
    59  	}
    60  	return &resp.SecondarySpStorePrice, nil
    61  }
    62  
    63  // ListStorageProviders return the storage provider info on chain
    64  // isInService indicates if only display the sp with STATUS_IN_SERVICE status
    65  func (c *client) ListStorageProviders(ctx context.Context, isInService bool) ([]spTypes.StorageProvider, error) {
    66  	request := &spTypes.QueryStorageProvidersRequest{}
    67  	gnfdRep, err := c.chainClient.StorageProviders(ctx, request)
    68  	if err != nil {
    69  		return nil, err
    70  	}
    71  
    72  	spList := gnfdRep.GetSps()
    73  	spInfoList := make([]spTypes.StorageProvider, 0)
    74  	for _, info := range spList {
    75  		if isInService && info.Status != spTypes.STATUS_IN_SERVICE {
    76  			continue
    77  		}
    78  		spInfoList = append(spInfoList, *info)
    79  	}
    80  
    81  	return spInfoList, nil
    82  }
    83  
    84  // GetStorageProviderInfo return the sp info with the sp chain address
    85  func (c *client) GetStorageProviderInfo(ctx context.Context, SPAddr sdk.AccAddress) (*spTypes.StorageProvider, error) {
    86  	request := &spTypes.QueryStorageProviderRequest{
    87  		SpAddress: SPAddr.String(),
    88  	}
    89  
    90  	gnfdRep, err := c.chainClient.StorageProvider(ctx, request)
    91  	if err != nil {
    92  		return nil, err
    93  	}
    94  
    95  	return gnfdRep.StorageProvider, nil
    96  }
    97  
    98  func (c *client) getSPUrlList() (map[string]*url.URL, error) {
    99  	ctx := context.Background()
   100  	spInfo := make(map[string]*url.URL, 0)
   101  	request := &spTypes.QueryStorageProvidersRequest{}
   102  	gnfdRep, err := c.chainClient.StorageProviders(ctx, request)
   103  	if err != nil {
   104  		return nil, err
   105  	}
   106  
   107  	spList := gnfdRep.GetSps()
   108  	if len(spList) == 0 {
   109  		return nil, errors.New("no SP found on chain")
   110  	}
   111  
   112  	for _, info := range spList {
   113  		var useHttps bool
   114  		if strings.Contains(info.Endpoint, "https") {
   115  			useHttps = true
   116  		} else {
   117  			useHttps = c.secure
   118  		}
   119  
   120  		urlInfo, urlErr := utils.GetEndpointURL(info.Endpoint, useHttps)
   121  		if urlErr != nil {
   122  			return nil, urlErr
   123  		}
   124  		spInfo[info.GetOperator().String()] = urlInfo
   125  	}
   126  
   127  	return spInfo, nil
   128  }
   129  
   130  // CreateStorageProvider will submit a CreateStorageProvider proposal and return proposalID, TxHash and err if it has.
   131  func (c *client) CreateStorageProvider(ctx context.Context, fundingAddr, sealAddr, approvalAddr, gcAddr string, endpoint string, depositAmount math.Int, description spTypes.Description, opts types.CreateStorageProviderOptions) (uint64, string, error) {
   132  	defaultAccount := c.MustGetDefaultAccount()
   133  	govModuleAddress, err := c.GetModuleAccountByName(ctx, govTypes.ModuleName)
   134  	if err != nil {
   135  		return 0, "", err
   136  	}
   137  	if opts.ProposalDepositAmount.IsNil() {
   138  		opts.ProposalDepositAmount = math.NewIntWithDecimal(1, gnfdSdkTypes.DecimalBNB)
   139  	}
   140  	if opts.ReadPrice.IsNil() {
   141  		opts.ReadPrice = sdk.NewDec(1)
   142  	}
   143  	if opts.StorePrice.IsNil() {
   144  		opts.StorePrice = sdk.NewDec(1)
   145  	}
   146  
   147  	fundingAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(fundingAddr)
   148  	if err != nil {
   149  		return 0, "", err
   150  	}
   151  	sealAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(sealAddr)
   152  	if err != nil {
   153  		return 0, "", err
   154  	}
   155  	approvalAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(approvalAddr)
   156  	if err != nil {
   157  		return 0, "", err
   158  	}
   159  	gcAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(gcAddr)
   160  	if err != nil {
   161  		return 0, "", err
   162  	}
   163  	msgCreateStorageProvider, err := spTypes.NewMsgCreateStorageProvider(
   164  		govModuleAddress.GetAddress(),
   165  		defaultAccount.GetAddress(),
   166  		fundingAcc, sealAcc, approvalAcc, gcAcc, description,
   167  		endpoint,
   168  		sdk.NewCoin(gnfdSdkTypes.Denom, depositAmount),
   169  		opts.ReadPrice,
   170  		opts.FreeReadQuota,
   171  		opts.StorePrice,
   172  	)
   173  	if err != nil {
   174  		return 0, "", err
   175  	}
   176  	err = msgCreateStorageProvider.ValidateBasic()
   177  	if err != nil {
   178  		return 0, "", err
   179  	}
   180  
   181  	return c.SubmitProposal(ctx, []sdk.Msg{msgCreateStorageProvider}, opts.ProposalDepositAmount, opts.ProposalTitle, opts.ProposalSummary, types.SubmitProposalOptions{Metadata: opts.ProposalMetaData, TxOption: opts.TxOption})
   182  }
   183  
   184  func (c *client) GrantDepositForStorageProvider(ctx context.Context, spAddr string, depositAmount math.Int, opts types.GrantDepositForStorageProviderOptions) (string, error) {
   185  	granter := c.MustGetDefaultAccount()
   186  	govModuleAddress, err := c.GetModuleAccountByName(ctx, govTypes.ModuleName)
   187  	if err != nil {
   188  		return "", err
   189  	}
   190  	spAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(spAddr)
   191  	if err != nil {
   192  		return "", err
   193  	}
   194  	coin := sdk.NewCoin(gnfdSdkTypes.Denom, depositAmount)
   195  	authorization := spTypes.NewDepositAuthorization(spAcc, &coin)
   196  
   197  	if opts.Expiration == nil {
   198  		expiration := time.Now().Add(24 * time.Hour)
   199  		opts.Expiration = &expiration
   200  	}
   201  	msgGrant, err := authz.NewMsgGrant(granter.GetAddress(), govModuleAddress.GetAddress(), authorization, opts.Expiration)
   202  	if err != nil {
   203  		return "", err
   204  	}
   205  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdk.Msg{msgGrant}, &opts.TxOption)
   206  	if err != nil {
   207  		return "", err
   208  	}
   209  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   210  }
   211  
   212  func (c *client) UpdateSpStoragePrice(ctx context.Context, spAddr string, readPrice, storePrice sdk.Dec, freeReadQuota uint64, TxOption gnfdSdkTypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   213  	spAcc, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(spAddr)
   214  	if err != nil {
   215  		return "", err
   216  	}
   217  	msgUpdateStoragePrice := &spTypes.MsgUpdateSpStoragePrice{
   218  		SpAddress:     spAcc.String(),
   219  		ReadPrice:     readPrice,
   220  		StorePrice:    storePrice,
   221  		FreeReadQuota: freeReadQuota,
   222  	}
   223  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdk.Msg{msgUpdateStoragePrice}, &TxOption)
   224  	if err != nil {
   225  		return "", err
   226  	}
   227  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   228  }
